info: * Click & Meet is currently not yet permitted in all federal states. Please observe the protective measures applicable to your federal state.

part.description: With Click & Meet*, it is again possible for customers with a pre-arranged appointment to enter stores for a limited time and in compliance with hygiene rules. In order to be able to track the contacts, customer data is to be recorded.
part.title: Secure shopping with appointment

list: Uncomplicated and fast setup of your individual appointment calendar
Generate a QR code that leads directly to your booking form - Show your customers directly in the shop window that you assign Click & Meet appointments
Automatically capture and organize your customers' contact information - directly during the appointment booking process
part.title: How we optimally support you with Click & Meet
For those who want to enable appointment shopping

title: Click & Meet with Bookingflix
